attributes.action: Change the benefits system - Dont let people with 'real' disabilities lose their money for care
attributes.additional_details:
I have aspergers syndrome myself and I claim esa/incapacity benefit. Some people are severer than me - some cant even speak but we CAN for them. Dont let these people suffer because the system is wrong. In all my time on benefit approximately 7 years, the department of work and pensions who deal with my claims have if never or rarely spoken to my doctor about my disability. This shows you how easy it is to claim benefits without proper medical evidence.
Dont let these people suffer.  There needs to be proper medically trained people assessing these people.
